A Pilot’s Guide to Inertial Reference Systems, Part Two
Part Two of this series on the IRS will explore technological advancements including Ring Laser Gyros and the addition of GPS position data... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Oct2017/IRS2Oct17]]>

The FAA’s original planned cutover date of September 23-24 was pushed back to October 21-22.... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Oct2017/FANSOct17]]> Radar Corner <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Oct2017/WSOct17]]> Understanding Airborne Windshear Detection Systems, Part One
The largest recorded microburst occurred right after Air Force 1 landed at Andrews AFB. The wind direction and speed changed 180 degrees and 109 knots... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Oct2017/WSOct17]]>

NavDB Update <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Oct2017/NavDBOct17]]>
Change to eCharts Media Filters Runway Length
In order to accommodate database growth, INDS has made a change to eCharts revision ‘A’ media by removing charts for airports where all runways are less than 5,200 feet... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Oct2017/NavDBOct17]]>
